Class Game

      Parameters:
      name - name of the player
      wizard - wizard chosen by the player
      towerColor - color chosen by the player

      Returns:
      the next player going to play

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the player if is found, null otherwise

      public void resetStrategies()
      To reset all the strategies to the standard ones

    • useCharacter

      public void useCharacter(CharacterCard character)
      Pays the cost of the chosen character, refills it with students and notify the observer the changes.
      Parameters:
      character - the chosen character

    • canUseCharacter

      public boolean canUseCharacter(CharacterCard character)
      Parameters:
      character - the chosen character
      Returns:
      true if the character can be played by the current player, otherwise false

    • moveMotherNature

      public boolean moveMotherNature(int steps, Player player)
      Check if is possible to move motherNature of specified steps
      Parameters:
      steps - that the player wants motherNature to do
      player - going to perform the action
      Returns:
      true and perform the movement, false if not possible

    • pickFromCloud

      public boolean pickFromCloud(int cloud)
      Pick pawns from the chosen cloud and put it in current player's entrance
      Parameters:
      cloud - the chosen cloud
      Returns:
      true if adding to the entrance is ok, otherwise false
